name: Search a specific product in olx using all filters

testSteps.description: Example #1: {department=antioquia, city=medellin, category=Video juegos - Consolas, subCategory=Video juegos, minprice=100, maxPrice=100000, specificSearch=Fifa 18 Ps4, expectedValue=Fifa 18 Ps4}

children.description: Given Lucho is in the site olx
Lucho opens the Olx home page

When he search a product in the bar search
| play 4 |
Lucho enters 'play 4' into The search bar
Lucho clicks on The search button
Then he verify that there are results
Then the search result should be (true)

Given Lucho applies filters to search results
| department | city | category | subCategory | minPrice | maxPrice |
| antioquia | medellin | Video juegos - Consolas | Video juegos | 100 | 100000 |
Lucho enters '100' into The min price
Lucho enters '100000' into The max price
Lucho clicks on Button submit price
When he search the specific product "Fifa 18 Ps4"
Then he verify that the product "Fifa 18 Ps4" is loaded
Then the product should be 'Fifa 18 Ps4'

testSteps.description: Example #2: {department=antioquia, city=medellin, category=Video juegos - Consolas, subCategory=Video juegos, minprice=100, maxPrice=100000, specificSearch=SuperMega play4k, expectedValue=SuperMega play4k}
